steps.command: cd {{$home}} && if [ ! -d '.venv' ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi
cd {{$home}} && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel 2>&1
cd {{$home}} && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install opencv-python numpy pillow flask flask-cors 2>&1

mkdir -p {{$home}}/input && cd {{$home}}/input && if [ ! -f sample.jpg ]; then curl -s -o sample.jpg 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400' || echo 'Could not download sample image'; fi
echo 'âœ… Installation complete! You can now start the app.'
